title: How are %Ap modifiers calculated
body:
When you buy rabadons you get 35% extra AP and when you get dragon buff you get 6% extra AP, are these calculated separately or together meaning

Separate: AP * .35 = x AP+AP= new ap total. New AP total * .06= x AP+New Ap total= Final result

vs

Together: 35%+6%=41%, AP * .41= x AP + AP= Final result


both methods give different results, the first option gives more AP and the second one gives less. Does anyone know how it is calculated?

replies.body: They stack additively (so Deathcap + one stack of the new Fire dragon buff would give you 35% + 8% for 43% bonus AP).
would it stack additive with the updated blue buff? thats crazy. a veigar with some 1.5k ap would be possible
Yes. % multipliers stack additively so that cases like Blue Buff + Rabadon's + Fire Dragon don't get as nuts as they would multiplicatively.

I hit 1200 AP on Veigar (my main) in the game in which I hit lv. 30. It is still the high moment of my league career!
